loot_on_hand: A few trade bars, assorted trinkets, and modest coin—enough to keep taverns talking but not enough to pay full shares.
bounty: Crown notice posted in major ports; details unknown but rising.
debts_oaths: A docking debt at Port Scathe (fees deferred).
An unnamed favor owed to a Free Harbors fixer.
current_job_leads: Rumor auction: bottle-map to the Sunken Crown (low tide in three days).
Company courier: offer of 'exclusive' work from Factor Lysa Quell.
Navy presence at Sablemarket: someone is asking for Ben the Muster's berth.
